Posts.Content: please dont feel down. ive been told that u can colour your hair, and have hilights. my hair was long and bottle blonde, and now its grown back salt and pepper. i finished chemo and radio in the last 3 months and am gonna have my hair bleached again soon :D am gonna have a patch test behing my ears 1st, but loads of ppl have told me it should be ok :D xx
Posts.Title: Chances of recurrence
